comments.body:
Hi @almarklein, you could also add

``` yaml
about:
  description: |
    Flexx is a pure Python toolkit for creating graphical user interfaces
    (GUIâ€™s), that uses web technology for its rendering. You can use Flexx to
    create desktop applications, web applications, and (if designed well)
    export an app to a standalone HTML document. It also works in the Jupyter
    notebook.
  doc_url: http://flexx.readthedocs.io/en/stable/
  dev_url: https://github.com/zoofIO/flexx
```
